name: April's Aquarium / yourlocalfishstore.com
address: April's Aquarium / yourlocalfishstore.com, 38 E 69th Ave, Vancouver, BC V5X 4K6

featured_reviews.review_id:
April's Aquarium has become a mecca for the planted Aquarium hobby. I can't  say enough good things. They regularly order unique and interesting fish. Their team is surprisingly knowledgeable.

The experience has improved since the two locations merged. Having all the live stock in one location is convenient.

I've been very happy with aquarium coop products, and the wide selection of hardscape. They stand by their product warranties.

Lastly, April's aquarium treats their fish with great care. They score big points on quality. The fish they sell are well fed and healthier than I'm used too. I haven't had any issues with diseases. They are the only store I know of that quarantines all of their fish before selling it.
featured_reviews.review_text:
April's Aquarium has become a mecca for the planted Aquarium hobby. I can't  say enough good things. They regularly order unique and interesting fish. Their team is surprisingly knowledgeable.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank-you for your very kind sentiments and your very valuable 5 stars we really do appreciate it. On the quarantine , we are very sure some do but not for 7-10 days as we do , this has proven a dramatic and significant reduction in customer issues / complaints and concerns , which is obviously prudent to a successful business for many reasons. We are delighted you recognized this as a benefit to the customer , healthy fish / happy customer / happy lLFS win win win. Thanks for all your support and of course we hope to see you again very soon @yourlocalfishstore

featured_reviews.review_id: April's Aquarium has always been super helpful and amazing when I have shopped in store and online. It's a great environment to go and shop around for any of your aquarium needs and they have a HUGE selection of fish and supplies. This past week I have been sick in bed and there was a short noticed scheduled power outage and April's delivered a battery operated air pump to me same day! I am so grateful to have such an amazing local fish store that cares so much! And they have online shopping for people that are not in driving distance! Highly recommend!!! Thanks for your fantastic service :)

Thanks for your fantastic service :)
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Soraya, what a great and perfect review of our overall offerings, thank-you very much for all your support and commitment to our small business and of course we hope to hear from you again very soon @yourlocalfishstore

featured_reviews.review_id:
This is an incredible aquarium store, highly recommend!

Over the last few months I've been building a 55 gallon aquarium for my 21-year old Red Eared Slider. Every employee there is really knowledgeable about aquarium care. Although I wasn't there to buy fish, the principles are all pretty much the same for my turtle, and I was able to get all the necessary decorations, chemicals, and materials to make the perfect home for my turtle.

I also ordered my aquarium stand from them at a great price compared to other stores, and they hand-delivered it to me within the week! I felt particularly grateful for that, because I did not have the strength to carry that item myself, and I was already a bit stressed about that. They took the worry right out of my hands. Not to mention...it was free!

I also had one of the employees teach me about improving the flora in my aquarium, and advised me on some good decorations that would not just be pretty, but support the health of the tank. Since I've done the recommendations, my tank is healthier than it has ever been, and it requires less maintenance compared to before. Every time I go into the store I learn a bunch of new things!

I always enjoy going to April's Aquarium. Not just because it's fun to look at the fishes and browse the goods, but because the service is truly top notch. I highly recommend it for all your aquarium needs! Thank you!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Lily, I do really honestly don't know were to start. This review is absolutely outstanding , out the gate we cannot thank-you enough for such a detailed / in depth and in a word PERFECT review. "Top Notch" "Incredible" "Highly recommended"  these statements make us very happy to know we are on the right track and meeting our objectives and your fine comments just underline our efforts are worthwhile. We cannot thank-you enough for all your support this just amazing review and of course we hope to see you again very soon @yourlocalfishstore

featured_reviews.review_id:
Love ordering from Aprils!  Always an easy and pleasant experience. Fish are healthy, fast shipping and reasonably priced for overnight, super quick to answer messages and good communication.
Repeat and happy customer with cute little baby pea puffers.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Carolyn , what a great review, we  cannot thank-you enough for all your support and of course we hope to hear from you again very soon @yourlocalfishstore

featured_reviews.review_id: Although not my first time purchasing from April's it was my first time receiving a shipment. The fish arrived happy and healthy. I can't say enough about April's Aquarium. Darrin and the staff are knowledgeable and care about their stock and it shows. They have a really good variety of fish, are very helpful and the store is a treat to visit. Huge bins of hardscape will keep you there for hours if you're not careful. Highly recommend them. This shipment I got a bunch of these cuties. Love them!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wendy , we cannot thank-you enough what a wonderful thought out review and very much appreciated. Cheers for all the kind words of encouragement and of course we hope to see you again very soon @yourlocalfishstore

featured_reviews.review_id:
In my opinion we need more Local Fish Stores (LFS). As a child growing up in the Lower Mainland the only fish stores I knew were LFS where the owners were hobbyist and knew about the fish with great advice. There are very few of those stores left and as far as my now decades in the hobby guides my understanding April's is great store. In the new location they are working hard to improve and things are only getting better. I often travel to Seattle and impressed by LFS like Aquarium Coop, Aquarium Zen and Sierra Pets and as far as I am concerned April's is as close to those experiences that you'll find locally.

As I work to add fish to my newest planted tanks April's was the go-to for variety and selection and reasonable price. I bought enough fish so that they were delivered to ... you can't get any better than that.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Victor, thank-you sir for your very insightful review and saying we are    
"great" certainly is  appreciated. We will for sure strive to gain your 5 star rating and earn your valuable business. Thanks for everything you do for the better good of our hobby and of course we hope to see you again very soon @yourlocalfishstore.

featured_reviews.review_id:
April's Aquarium is our go-to place for all our aquatic needs. We were impressed by their variety of fish when we visited their Vancouver location. The owner Darrin is very knowledgeable and friendly, and he always answers our emails promptly.

We have ordered several deliveries from them since our first visit, and we are very happy with the quality of the fish. They arrive healthy and lively, and they have adapted well to our aquarium.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Ken , thank you very much for your candid and excellent review of our overall offerings. We appreciate it very much as it does help us along on our journey. Your valuable business is also not unrecognized and we look forward to being of service and again very soon @yourlocalfishstore

featured_reviews.review_id: The BEST aquarium in town, very assorted, the staff is very wise and friendly, all my plants, fishes and shrimps are from here!, if you are looking something different and cool, this is the place!
